meanings.definition: To change the structure or form of (something)
meanings.sent1: She remodels her room by moving the furniture around.
meanings.sent2: The construction crew remodels the old house to make it look new.
meanings.sent3: The cat remodels the blanket into a cozy nest for itself.
meanings.sent4: Time remodels memories, shaping them into different stories.
meanings.sent5: The artist remodels the clay into a beautiful sculpture.

meanings.definition: To give a new shape or form to (something)
meanings.sent1: He remodels the garden by planting colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: The fashion designer remodels the dress to fit the model perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The chef remodels the recipe, adding a unique twist to the dish.
meanings.sent4: Laughter remodels a gloomy atmosphere into a cheerful one.
meanings.sent5: The architect remodels the building, creating a modern masterpiece.
